allow: Bash(# Check HomeController - is it used anywhere? grep -rn ""HomeController"" c:/laravel/library_fokara/routes/ c:/laravel/library_fokara/app/ # Check scripts.js vs scripts1.js ls -la c:/laravel/library_fokara/public/js/scripts*.js # Check UserModel vs User models cat c:/laravel/library_fokara/app/Models/User.php)

Bash(# Check scripts1.js content cat c:/laravel/library_fokara/public/js/scripts1.js # Check login2 - is it used anywhere? grep -rn ""login2"" c:/laravel/library_fokara/resources/views/ c:/laravel/library_fokara/routes/)
Bash(# Check if HomeController is referenced anywhere grep -rn ""HomeController"" c:/laravel/library_fokara/ --include=""*.php"" --include=""*.blade.php"")
Bash(# Check if scripts1.js is referenced in any view grep -rn ""scripts1"" c:/laravel/library_fokara/resources/ # Check main.blade.php cat c:/laravel/library_fokara/resources/views/main.blade.php)
Bash(# Check if main.blade.php is referenced anywhere grep -rn ""main\\b"" c:/laravel/library_fokara/resources/ --include=""*.blade.php"")

Bash(# Check scripts1.js references in views grep -rn ""scripts1\\.js"" c:/laravel/library_fokara/resources/ # Check welcome.blade.php routing grep -rn ""welcome"" c:/laravel/library_fokara/routes/ # Check main.blade.php references grep -rn ""main\\.blade\\|''main''"" c:/laravel/library_fokara/resources/views/ --include=""*.blade.php"")
